item.title: Convolution
item.description:
Convolution

Image will be of shape: (H * W * channels)

Our kernel will also be of shape (Hk * Wk * channels)

The number of channels is same as it is volume convolution.

In case of 1 * 1 convolution, the convolution helps decrease or increase the feature map dimensions.

item.title: ML Causality
item.description:
Causality in ML:

–Inspirations and References: J. Peters, D. Janzing, and B. Schölkopf. 2017. Elements of Causal Inference - Foundations and Learning Algorithms. MIT
